1 var DATA_TYPES = require('../constants/DataTypes'),
  2   Helpers = require('../utils/Helpers'),
  3   ErrorMessages = require('../constants/ErrorMessages'),
  4   CAS = require('../constants/CASConstants');
  5 
  6 module.exports = LOBReadPacket;
  7 
  8 /**
  9  * Constructor
 10  * @param options
 11  * @constructor
 12  */
 13 function LOBReadPacket(options) {
 14   options = options || {};
 15 
 16   this.casInfo = options.casInfo;
 17   this.dbVersion = options.dbVersion;
 18 
 19   this.lobBuffer = '';
 20   this.lobHandle = '';
 21 
 22   this.responseCode = 0;
 23   this.errorCode = 0;
 24   this.errorMsg = '';
 25 }
 26 
 27 /**
 28  * Write data
 29  * @param writer
 30  * @param lobHandle
 31  * @param offset
 32  * @param len
 33  */
 34 LOBReadPacket.prototype.write = function (writer, lobHandle, offset, len) {
 35   var bufferLength = DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.CAS_INFO_SIZE +
 36     DATA_TYPES.BYTE_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + lobHandle.packedLobHandle.length +
 37     DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.LONG_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF + DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF;
 38 
 39   this.lobHandle = lobHandle;
 40   writer._writeInt(bufferLength - DATA_TYPES.DATA_LENGTH_SIZEOF - DATA_TYPES.CAS_INFO_SIZE);
 41   writer._writeBytes(DATA_TYPES.CAS_INFO_SIZE, this.casInfo);
 42 
 43   writer._writeByte(CAS.CASFunctionCode.CAS_FC_LOB_READ);
 44   writer._writeInt(lobHandle.packedLobHandle.length); //LOB handle size
 45   writer._writeBytes(lobHandle.packedLobHandle.length, lobHandle.packedLobHandle); //LOB handle
 46   writer._writeInt(DATA_TYPES.LONG_SIZEOF);
 47   writer._writeLong(offset); //ofset
 48   writer._writeInt(DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF);
 49   writer._writeInt(len); //number of bytes to read
 50 
 51   return writer;
 52 };
 53 
 54 /**
 55  * Read data
 56  * @param parser
 57  */
 58 LOBReadPacket.prototype.parse = function (parser) {
 59   var responseLength = parser._parseInt();
 60   this.casInfo = parser._parseBytes(DATA_TYPES.CAS_INFO_SIZE);
 61 
 62   this.responseCode = parser._parseInt();
 63   if (this.responseCode < 0) {
 64     this.errorCode = parser._parseInt();
 65     this.errorMsg = parser._parseNullTerminatedString(responseLength - 2 * DATA_TYPES.INT_SIZEOF);
 66     if (this.errorMsg.length === 0) {
 67       this.errorMsg = Helpers._resolveErrorCode(this.errorCode);
 68     }
 69   } else {
 70     if (this.lobHandle.lobType === CAS.CUBRIDDataType.CCI_U_TYPE_BLOB) {
 71       this.lobBuffer = parser._parseBytes(this.responseCode);
 72     } else {
 73       this.lobBuffer = parser._parseString(this.responseCode);
 74     }
 75     return this.responseCode;
 76   }
 77 };
 78 
 79 
 80
